physDesc.p: Fragments 1-13 (in mm), (1) 19 x 32, (A) 2 lines (?), top margin, (B) 3 lines, left margin, (2) 39 x 34, (A) 2 lines, top bottom margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (3) 48 x 12, (A) traces of 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, no margins, (4) 36 x 26, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (5) 26 x 9, (A) traces of 4 lines (?), vertical line, left margin, (B) trace, (6) 33 x 19, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (7) 37 x 26, (A) traces of 4 (?) lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (8) 30 x 22, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 (?) lines, no margins, (9) 14 x 11, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (10) 20 x 11, (A) traces of 2 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (11) 77 x 15, (A) traces of left margin of 7 (?) lines, (B) 9 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (12) 50 x 33, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) 2 lines, top right margins, (13) 50 x 24, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins
